details: # beginning of fit
# 1) closure of hospitality, schools, daycares
# 2) casinos subject to same measures as food/beverage outlets
# 3) Children and young people can participate in outdoor activities
# 4) reopening of primary schools and daycare @ 50% capacity
# 5) cafes/restaurants reopen with max 30 visitor, primary schools and daycares open at 100%
# 6) secondary schools reopen @ 100% capacity
# 7) Small groups allowed at universities
# 8) maximum 6 people in household
# 9) groups <= 50 people, some hospitality closes at midnight or 1 AM
# 10) max 3 visitors at home, max group size 30, face masks in public areas
# 11) cafes/restaurants close, no team sports, 3 visitors at home per day
# 12) hotels can't sell alcohol after 20:00
# 13) 2 visitors per day, groups <= 20
# 14) 3 visitors per day, groups <= 30
# 15) masks mandatory in all public and indoor areas
# 16) non-essential shops close
# 17) beginning of vaccination program
# 18) 1 visitor per day/curfew (23/01/2021)
# 19) Primary schools, child care, special ed reopen
# 20) secondary schools partially reopen, contact professions reopen (3/3/2021)
# 21) some retail reopens
# 22) curfew to start at 22:00 instead of 21:00
# 23) out of school care fully reopens
# 24) curfew canceled
# 25) <27 can play outdoor sports, groups <= 30, non-essential travel allowed within NL
# 26) 4 visitors per day, museums reopen, group <= 50, restaurants reopen
# 27) vaccination of 12-17 year olds starts, Delta becomes dominant strain
# 28) all restrictions relaxed, except masks on public transport, nightclubs reopen
# 29) catering industry reopens, test for entry with large events, nightclubs close
# 30) work from home advisory re-instated
# break up long time window
# 31) Physical classes resume at MBO schools, colleges and universities, The 1.5 meters no longer applies. Maximum group size = 75, face masks must be worn outside the classrooms/lecture halls
# 32) 1.5 m distance no longer required, coronapass needed in horeca and events
# 33) coronapass use expanded, work from home half the time, masks in public spaces
# 34) non-essential shops close at 5pm, essential shops close at 8pm
# 35) stay at home advise, 1.5 m distance, work from home, self-tests advised before visiting other, masks in schools
# 36) 2 people in house per day, non-essential shops closed, non-medical contact professions closed, schools closed, all events banned
# 37) schools re-open, non-essential shops re-open until 5PM, face masks advised everywhere
# 38) shops can stay open until 10PM, max number visitors increased to 4 per day, catering,/theaters/museums re-open, quesrantine not required for people with booster
# 39) people can work from the office half the time, unlimited visitors at home
# 40) most measures lifted, except corona pass, masks on public transport, testing for large events
# last date of fit.
